name: qtopcmp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccmp), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ccmp))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccmp), wfn(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ccmp))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wfo(c1, c2, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(c1, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ccmp))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1[Fn]c2)→(c0[qTop]c1)∈ Comp)
⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
⊣ (c0 ∈ Comp → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Comp ∧(c1 : c2 ↠ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1))∧ c1 ∈(c0[Cn](c0[qTop]c1)))→(c0[qTop]c1)∈ Comp)

-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wfo(c1, c2, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(c1, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ccmp))

stmt.origin: cncmp(c0, c1, c2, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), co(c0, cqtop, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wfo(c1, c2, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(c1, co(c0, ccn, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ccmp))
-| wceq(cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))

comment: A quotient of a compact space is compact. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)
